quickbooks.description: Unite the power of {{friendlyName}}'s management suite with QuickBooks' financial prowess for an integrated, efficient trucking business solution.

what_is_quickbooks.title: What is QuickBooks?
what_is_quickbooks.description: QuickBooks is a household name in the realm of business finance, designed to simplify the intricate tapestry of accounting. As an innovative financial software solution, QuickBooks provides businesses, irrespective of size, with a toolkit rich in invoicing, cash flow management, tax computation, and payroll processing. Its cloud-driven approach ensures every financial move is recorded, analyzed, and made accessible for strategic planning.

merge_with_quickbooks.title: {{friendlyName}} Merges with QuickBooks: Financial Clarity on the Move
merge_with_quickbooks.description: When {{friendlyName}} integrates with QuickBooks, the result is a seamless fusion of fleet management with streamlined financial operations. Think automatic logging of load-related expenses, swift and accurate invoicing post-trip, and the ability to keep tabs on your financial health from the same platform that oversees your fleet. With this alliance, gone are the days of juggling between tools or manual data transfers. Instead, experience real-time financial data syncing, ensuring fleet operators can focus on what matters most: delivering quality service and driving growth.

tsc.description: Empower your fleet with enhanced fuel savings, optimizing every mile driven. Integrate all TCS Fuel Cards seamlessly within {{friendlyName}}'s platform.

what_is_tsc.title: What is TCS Fuel Card?
what_is_tsc.description: TCS, or TransConnect Services, revolutionizes the way truckers and trucking companies handle their fuel expenses. Going beyond just a fuel card, TCS offers significant fuel discounts, zero transaction fees at in-network locations, and an array of other features. From a user-friendly mobile app to itemized fuel statements perfect for IFTA reporting, TCS stands out as a reliable partner ensuring your fuel costs are always under control.

optimizes_tcs.title: How {{friendlyName}} Optimizes TCS Fuel Card
optimizes_tcs.description: Integrating {{friendlyName}} with TCS Fuel Card merges state-of-the-art fleet management with optimal fuel expenditure. Enjoy real-time monitoring of fuel savings directly in {{friendlyName}} dashboard. Easily track and analyze fuel consumption patterns, ensuring you tap into the significant savings TCS offers. Furthermore, {{friendlyName}}'s integration encompasses TCS's core features like in-route fuel savings location finder, security protocols for safeguarding transactions, and streamlined account management. The synergy of {{friendlyName}} and TCS means simplified fuel management, with reduced costs, bolstering your bottom line.

fleet_one_wex.description: Elevate your fuel management with automated transaction syncing from Fleet One WEX to {{friendlyName}}'s platform.

what_is_fleet_one_wex.title: What is Fleet One WEX?
what_is_fleet_one_wex.description: Fleet One WEX stands as an industry leader, offering bespoke solutions tailored for fleets ranging from 1 to 50 vehicles. It‚Äôs not just about fuel cards packed with attractive discounts; Fleet One dives deeper into the needs of modern trucking businesses. From extensive fuel networks that ensure unparalleled savings to an array of factoring and financing solutions, Fleet One WEX has positioned itself as the ultimate partner for fleet operators who seek growth, efficiency, and financial clarity.

sync_with_fleet.title: {{friendlyName}}'s Seamless Sync with Fleet One WEX
sync_with_fleet.description:
Pairing {{friendlyName}} with Fleet One WEX unlocks a realm of fuel management efficiency. No more manual entries or delayed reconciliations. With our integration, every fuel transaction made via Fleet One is instantaneously and automatically imported into {{friendlyName}}'s system. This not only eliminates human error but ensures fleet operators have real-time access to their fuel expenditures. By merging the capabilities of {{friendlyName}}'s comprehensive trucking management system with Fleet One's fuel transaction data, fleet businesses can enjoy a comprehensive overview of their operations, driving informed decision-making, and promoting significant savings.
 
 Stay ahead of the curve, blending state-of-the-art fleet management with live fuel transaction insights.

motive.description: Unlock real-time fleet insights and driver monitoring from Motive, all within the intuitive {{friendlyName}} platform.

what_is_motive.title: What is Motive?
what_is_motive.description: Motive brings a new dimension to fleet management with its advanced electronic logging and tracking system. It delivers an unparalleled view into vehicle whereabouts, driver behaviors, and compliance reports. Motive isn't just about compliance; it's about gleaning insights to optimize every movement in your fleet's journey.

motive.title: {{friendlyName}} & Motive: A Unified Vision
motive.description: Integrating {{friendlyName}} with Motive amplifies the power of both platforms. By seamlessly syncing live data, {{friendlyName}} enriches fleet management capabilities. Whether it's pinpointing the exact location of your trucks or understanding driver statuses for better route planning, this alliance offers a 360-degree operational panorama. Minimize the guesswork, reduce manual overlaps, and drive your fleet towards unparalleled efficiency with this cohesive integration.

samsara.description: Achieve precision tracking and real-time driver monitoring seamlessly combined in {{friendlyName}}'s platform.

what_is_samsara.title: What is Samsara ELD?
what_is_samsara.description: Samsara ELD is a cutting-edge, electronic logging device that offers advanced fleet management features. It provides detailed visibility into vehicle locations, driver activities, and safety reporting. Samsara ensures regulatory compliance while giving operators an in-depth look into their fleet's operations.

enhances_samsara.title: How {{friendlyName}} Enhances Samsara ELD
enhances_samsara.description: {{friendlyName}}'s integration with Samsara ELD offers an enhanced operational capability. By syncing live Hours of Service (HoS) data from drivers, {{friendlyName}} empowers dispatch teams to make informed, data-driven decisions on-the-go. Whether it's tracking your truck or trailer via GPS or utilizing driver status to optimize routing, this integration provides a holistic view, merging the strengths of both platforms for efficient fleet management. It reduces manual checks and promotes a more cohesive, streamlined operational process ‚Äì positioning your fleet for success.

eld_rider.description: Seamless asset tracking, odometer data, automated load stop updates, and real-time Hours of Service visibility

intro_about_eld_rider.title: Intro about ELD Rider
intro_about_eld_rider.description: ELD Rider stands out as a comprehensive telematics and ELD provider, dedicated exclusively to the trucking industry. By offering cost-effective ELD devices, advanced trailer tracking solutions, and an easy-to-use driver application, ELD Rider streamlines the integration of telematics technology for carriers. This integration not only facilitates seamless asset tracking but also empowers carriers with the tools necessary for efficient and compliant operations.

how_works.title: Description of How Our Integration Works
how_works.description:
ELD Rider integration unlocks a real-time stream of data, offering insights into truck and trailer locations, odometer readings for proactive maintenance scheduling, and precise GPS positioning. The system's capability for automatic load stop updates streamlines the check-in/check-out process at each stop, providing carriers with accurate data for detention billing. Additionally, this integration enriches dispatcher tools with real-time visibility of driver Hours of Service (HoS), enabling smarter, compliance-aware load planning.
 
 A standout feature of our integration is the capacity to automatically broadcast truck availability to connected load boards based on current locations, enhancing load matching efficiency. Moreover, carriers can effortlessly share real-time load tracking with customers through secure links, reducing the need for constant communication and significantly improving customer satisfaction. For those utilizing MacroPoint, our system seamlessly pushes load tracking data, further streamlining the process for comprehensive load visibility.

remove.body: This will remove the insurance endorsement for the truck.

endorse.title: Do you want to endorse the insurance?
endorse.body: This will endorse the insurance for the truck.

delete.title: Delete Payout
delete.body: Are you sure you want to delete this payout?

tooltips.disabled_edit: This payout is linked to a QuickBooks bill payment. You can't edit it.
tooltips.disabled_delete: This payout is linked to a QuickBooks bill payment. You can't delete it.

confirm.title: Are you sure you want to create the payment bill?
confirm.body: Once created, the payment bill cannot be edited. It can only be voided or deleted.

confirm.title: Are you sure you want to void the payment bill?
confirm.body: This will cancel the payment bill and it cannot be undone.

confirm.title: Are you sure you want to delete the payment bill?
confirm.body: This action cannot be canceled and the payment bill will be deleted.

confirm.title: Are you sure you want to sync the payment bill?
confirm.body: This action cannot be canceled and the payment bill will be sync.

validation.bank_account: The payment must have a bank account
validation.bank_account_not_connected: The system bank account must be linked to quickbooks

confirm.title: Are you sure you want to create the bill?
confirm.body: Once created, the bill cannot be edited. It can only be deleted.

confirm.title: Are you sure you want to delete the bill?
confirm.body: This action cannot be canceled and the bill will be deleted.

delete.disabled_tooltip: A QuickBooks bill cannot be deleted if a payment for the bill is already recorded in QuickBooks.

sync.disabled_tooltip: A QuickBooks bill cannot be synced if a payment for the bill is already recorded in QuickBooks.

confirm.title: Are you sure you want to sync the bill?
confirm.body: This action cannot be canceled and the bill will be sync.

required.label: Required means that this category must be filled out when creating a new load and it will automatically be added to new load drafts.

default.label: Check to make this cycle your organizations default cycle and automatically assign all new drivers to this cycle.
